title: Ketogenesis and Ketone Measurement
content: Both ketogenic diets and fasting have the common effect of drastically limiting glucose availability in the body, which instead must then rely on fats for fuel. Measurement of ketone bodies provides a means for quantifying the level of ketosis that an individual is experiencing.

title: Breath Acetone Measurement
content: Breath acetone rises during a fast as the body mobilizes stored fat to meet its energy requirements. Breath acetone can now be measured with high precision, accuracy, and sensitivity (e.g.,1 ppm range), making it a viable alternative to blood BHB for ketone monitoring.

title: What is Biosense?
content: Readout Health developed BiosenseÂ®, which is currently the only medical-grade breath acetone device designed for tracking ketosis. The Biosense clinical trial showcased the technology and clinical data demonstrating a correlation of breath acetone with blood BHB.

title: Biosense Device and App
content: The Biosense device is a less invasive and more cost-effective way to measure ketones compared to BHB tests. It comes with a free app that provides personalized ketone data and goal tracking, and permits unlimited testing. The app also includes several in-app programs for weight loss, anti-inflammatory, and healthspan.

title: ACE Levels
content: Biosense uses proprietary units called ACEs, where 1 ACE is equivalent to 0.1 mmol/L of BHB. An ACE score of 5+ indicates ketosis, and the level of ACEs detected is influenced by the level of carbohydrate restriction, calorie restriction, or duration of fasting. A score of over 10 ACEs is recommended for a deeper and potentially more therapeutic state of ketosis, which can be achieved with a modified fasting approach or exercise.

title: Biosense breath acetone meter for clinical monitoring of therapeutic ketosis
content: The Biosense breath acetone meter is a tool for the clinical monitoring of therapeutic ketosis.

title: Monitoring nutrition, ketone supplementation, exercise, and fasting protocols
content: It can help those who want to monitor their nutrition, ketone supplementation, exercise, and fasting protocols to provide insight and feedback for actionable steps towards optimizing your metabolic health.
